text: Wouldn’t it be a great thing to look forward to, to try to plan an actual Vizcon (2-patch-1) in the fall, once people are vaccinated and we can all meet again? I’m betting it could even be the last straw to push it towards world domination

text: <@U66SGEWAC> <@UK1BNFHFV> <@U6BJ9E351> <@U74AERMNF> <@U80UK1NSJ> <@U6BNE7LTZ> and lots of other people - worth considering this at some time in Sept/Oct this year? We could, essentially, reuse a lot of the planning from Vizcon 2. And it would be a lot of fun imho

text: if it's in Berlin I would definitely try to be there  :smile:.

text: It’s not impossible we could get some support from NumFocus again I think

text: Given the current covid politics I wouldn't plan any in Person event this year. But if ot works out I would also try to be there

text: I think planning online is good, and switching to partially local in Berlin if possible for those who can make that work short term. We will get a better idea in the coming months

text: I was thinking we could plan a mini virtual vizcon already in the spring. That requires very little planning
